The above reprint rates cannot be pro rated on orders from more than one individual. An order
from one individual requiring shipments to more than one address will be charged with the addi¬
tional handling and shipping costs* On orders for reprints consisting of more than 16 pages
and/or more than 2500 copies, write for special estimate* Articles in excess of h pages can be
printed only in units of L* pages* In other words, a 7-page article must be printed as an 8-page
reprint and a 9-page article must be printed as a 12-page reprint*
Cost of extra copies of the Journal if ordered before the Journal is printed - 25 cents per copy
